level.heading: Law governing perfection and priority of agricultural liens.
level.text: While farm products are located in a jurisdiction, the local law of that jurisdiction governs perfection, the effect of perfection or nonperfection, and the priority of an agricultural lien on the farm products.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 28:11-106.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-201
level.text: For Law 13-201, see notes following ยง 28:9-101.
